text: Álex Leonardo Quiñónez Martínez (11 August 1989 - 22 October 2021) was an Ecuadorian sprinter. He competed in the 100 metres and 200 metres. He took part in representing Ecuador at the 2012 Summer Olympics and 2020 Summer Olympics. ==Background== Quiñónez was born in Esmeraldas, Ecuador. He won a bronze medal at the 2019 World Athletics Championships. ==Assassination== Quiñónez was shot to death on 22 October 2021 in Guayaquil, Ecuador at the age of 32.Asesinan a tiros al velocista olímpico ecuatoriano Álex Quiñónez ==References== Category:1989 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Murders by firearm Category:Sprinters Category:Competitors at the 2020 Summer Olympics Category:Olympians for Ecuador
title: Álex Quiñónez
